comment: Meet Mr and Mrs Ebe God bless your home . Celebrating those who got married in in the singles fellowship ! ! ! . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Meet Mr and Mrs Ebe God bless your home . Celebrating those who got married in in the singles fellowship ! ! ! . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / meet-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Mr"
                              :op2 "Ebe"))
                  :op2 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Mrs"
                              :op2 "Ebe"))))
      :snt2 (b / bless-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "God"))
            :ARG1 (h / home
                  :poss (y2 / you)))
      :snt3 (c / celebrate-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (p4 / person
                  :mod (t / that)
                  :ARG1-of (m3 / marry-01
                        :manner (f / fellowship-01
                              :mod (s / singles))))))
